Learning Model Parameters (2/3)
▪ Case 1: The topology of the network is known and we are only 
required to compute the probability tables
– We can easily compute the probability table for P(Xi|parents(Xi)) 
– We count the fraction of training instances for every value of Xi and every 
combination of values in parents(Xi)
